resources.string: I have read and accept the terms and conditions\n
You need to accept Terms and Conditions
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your user\'s account and loose all your modified recipes? \nThis cannot be undone

LEGAL NOTICE

Owner: LetsGetCactus
Trade name: Cocina con Catalina
Contact email: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com
Headquarters: Spain

This Legal Notice governs the use of the Cocina con Catalina mobile application (the App). Accessing or using the App implies full acceptance of these conditions.

The Owner may modify the App‚Äôs structure, content or usage conditions at any time.

COMPLIANCE STATEMENT

The App fully complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Spanish Organic Law 3/2018 (LOPDGDD). Compliance is ensured through Firebase-based authentication and storage, applying Data Minimization, Security principles and Privacy by Design according to Google‚Äôs standards.

The App acts solely as an interface to third-party content (e.g., YouTube and Spotify), governed by their own privacy policies.

PRIVACY POLICY

1. Data controller
LetsGetCactus. Contact: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com. Spain.

2. Personal data collected
- Name
- Email
- Password (encrypted)

Additional data may be requested in the future.

Firebase and Third-Party Integration:
Firebase is the Data Processor. Interactions with YouTube and Spotify follow their external privacy policies. Spotify access requires separate explicit consent.

3. Purpose of processing
- Account management
- Access to personalized features
- Publishing and rating recipes
- Service communications
- User experience improvement

All data is managed via Firebase Authentication and Firestore.

4. Legal basis
- User consent
- Contract performance
- Legal compliance

5. Data retention
Data is retained while the account remains active. Users may request full deletion (Auth + Firestore).

6. Data disclosure
Data will not be shared except where legally required or technically necessary.

7. User rights
Access, rectification, deletion, objection, restriction, portability: info.letsgetcactus@gmail.com.

8. Data security
Firebase applies encryption, hashing and salting.

9. Minors
Intended for users aged 14+.

COOKIES POLICY

The App does not use advertising cookies. Only essential technical identifiers are used.

Firebase generates authentication tokens and Device IDs for security and session control.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE

1. Purpose
These Terms govern access to and use of the App.

2. Registration
A valid account is required; users must keep their password confidential.

Mandatory consent:
Users must accept the Legal Notice, Privacy Policy, Cookies Policy and Terms of Use.
Spotify requires separate consent.

3. User-generated content
Users guarantee ownership of their posted content.

4. Intellectual property
All rights belong to LetsGetCactus.

5. Functioning and availability
Continuous availability is not guaranteed.

6. Third-party links
External services such as YouTube/Spotify are independent.

7. Paid services
Must be accepted explicitly if added.

8. Liability
Use of the App is at the user‚Äôs own risk.

9. Modifications
Terms may be updated.

10. Applicable law
Spanish law applies.

GDPR/LOPDGDD ‚Äì PRINCIPLES
- Data minimization
- Security via Firebase
- International transfers under Standard Contractual Clauses
- Full data erasure guaranteed
